price: Na tukawaumbia kutoka mfano wake wanavyo vipanda.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ
footnotes: Na tukawaumbia mfano wa hiyo marikebu na vyenginevyo wanavyo vipanda kadhaalika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
